name: Blank Tape
description:
A borderless screen for a timeless technology

Go beyond the borders of your monitor in this 2D puzzle platformer.

The end of your display is but the beginning.

Staff - “Plancha Corp”
  • Greet - 2D Art/Level Design
  • Octavien - Music Composer
  • Raiponz - Development among other things
  • Zessirb - Development and stuff
Bindings

Move your character using WASD keys. Jump with space bar.

For later levels, move the camera left and right using Q and E.

Use escape to go back to the level selection screen.
